channel.title: [PI][317] Need Help! Animation.Java - Adding Custom Animations

item.title: [PI][317] Need Help! Animation.Java - Adding Custom Animations
item.dc:creator: @c_o_l_d c o l d
item.description:
@c_o_l_d wrote:

Recently I have added a few stand/walk animations for my summoning npcs into animation.java (turned out to be successful.) Unfortunately the dump im using only goes up to 7295, which i think is the end of the 474 animations. I need the steel titan stand/walk animation (along with a few others) which happen to be in the 7500+ range. I dont want to do any cache editing/repacking i just want the hardcode for animation.java or class20.java. If anyone could point me in the right direction that would be great!

Just to be clear in case there is a misunderstanding i want this:

if(j == 0){ int file = 457; if(FrameStart[file] < 1) Class36.methodCustomAnimations(false, file); int[] frames = {18,24,25,26,27,28,29,30,31,19,20,21,22,23,0}; int[] delays = {2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,2,0}; aClass20Array351[j].anInt352 = frames.length-1; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353 = new int[frames.length-1]; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354 = new int[frames.length-1]; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355 = new int[frames.length-1]; for(int i2 = 0; i2 < frames.length-1; i2++){ aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray353[i2] = frames[i2]+FrameStart[file]; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray354[i2] = -1; aClass20Array351[j].anIntArray355[i2] = delays[i2]; } }

Read full topic
